text: hi it's Arielle Kaminer and I'm the
ethicist here's a letter from a reader a
couple of months ago a co-worker who was
also a friend died very suddenly I was
tasked with going through the work
computer a process that my friends
spouse was aware of and approved while
sorting through the emails i found a
draft of an unfinished and probably
unsent note to the spouse i just scanned
it long enough to realize the content
and it was about some pretty heavy
marital woes and I deleted it my
reasoning was that it would be very
hurtful to the spouse incidentally there
was no subject line so I needed to open
the message to determine the content did
I do the right thing so that's the
